text:
Wyndham Grand Xi’an South Celebrates its First Anniversary
Wyndham Grand Xi’an South just celebrated its first anniversary of providing a sophisticated hotel experience to global business and leisure travelers, standing as one of the top hotel choices in the ancient city of Xi’an.
Over the year, Wyndham Grand Xi’an South has been fortunate to welcome famous names and dignitaries, including an award-winning Hollywood director, former world leaders and popular musical artists and more. With its refined accommodation and attentive service, the hotel has received numerous industry honors and recognition from major travel portals such as Ctrip and eLong. Wyndham Grand Xi’an South also received TripAdvisor’ Certificate of Excellence in 2015, and was ranked the first of 2,170 hotels in Xi’an on the travel website.
“We are very pleased to see our managed Wyndham Grand property perform extraordinarily in Xi’an for the past 12 months,” said Leo Liu, Wyndham Hotel Group’s president and managing director, Greater China. “The hotel is an exemplary addition to the upscale Wyndham Hotels and Resorts portfolio. It has not only set new standards in the local market, but has become a role model for future Wyndham Grand properties as we expand the Wyndham brand into more cities in China.”
Wyndham Grand Xi’an South is situated in the heart of the famous tourist spot ‘Great Tang All Day Mall’ in the center of Qujiang New District in Xi’an, just minutes away from Dayan Pagoda, international shopping centers and historic heritage sites. It is also located just minutes from Xi’an International Conference Center and Qujiang International Conference & Exhibition Center.
The hotel is designed with a mixture of both contemporary and classic Chinese architectural style, with 565 spacious and beautiful guest rooms and suites. For dining experience, the hotel brings creativity to its dishes, presenting local favorites and exotic international cuisines. Equipped with world-class meeting facilities cater to high-level meetings and upscale private events.
Part of Wyndham Hotel Group, Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, LLC, offers upscale hotel and resort accommodations at more than 200 properties throughout the United States, Canada, Mexico, Central and South America, the Caribbean, Europe, the Middle East and China. Most Wyndham® hotels are franchised by Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, LLC or its affiliate. Certain Wyndham hotels are owned or managed by an affiliate of Wyndham Hotel Group, LLC.
